author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

Improve readability of output by converting returned stdout/stderr content from bytes. See [this log file](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/logreader/slc7_amd64_gcc10/CMSSW_12_2_ASAN_X_2021-11-08-2300/unitTestLogs/CondTools/SiStrip#/17) for example of why this is needed.
title: SiStripDAQPopCon.py: improve readability of output
